subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: L.S.U.’s game Saturday is nominally about preserving a shot at a championship.  More urgently, it’s a referendum on Coach Les Miles, who will face his predecessor, Nick Saban of Alabama.
snippet: L.S.U.’s game Saturday is nominally about preserving a shot at a championship.  More urgently, it’s a referendum on Coach Les Miles, who will face his predecessor, Nick Saban of Alabama.
